VariableDescription.Name: tha_efs_dot0_gse
VariableDescription.LongDescription: EFS_DOT0 (spin-fit, using E dot B=0) electric field vector in GSE coordinates
VariableDescription.Header:
#  WARNING: No Data Selected for this Time Period. 
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         THEMIS
#     SOURCE_NAME                     THA>Themis Probe A
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     DATA_TYPE                       EFI
#     DESCRIPTOR                      L2>L2 DATA
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     PI_NAME                         V. Angelopoulos, J. Bonnell & F. Mozer
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UCB, NASA NAS5-02099
#     TITLE                           Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Measurements
#     TEXT                            THEMIS-A: Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Electric field measurements. The L2                          
#     TEXT                             product is a 3D estimate of Eperp derived from the spin plane E-field measurements                    
#     TEXT                             assuming E dot B = 0, using relevant FGM (Flux-Gate Magnetometer) data.Includes                       
#     TEXT                             spin-averaged, and Fast-survey field data.Spin-averaged (EFS_DOT0) data has                           
#     TEXT                             approximately 3 second time resolution. Fast-survey (EFF_DOT0) data has 1/8                           
#                                      second time resolution.                                                                               
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Electric Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   THEMIS
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  tha_l2_efi
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 tha_l2_efi_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Spacecraft-collected (EFI) Electric field
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 3-1/8s
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Open Data for Scientific Use
#     GENERATED_BY                    THEMIS SOC
#     GENERATION_DATE                 Sun May 29 11:36:50 2011
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 NASA Contract NAS5-02099
#     MODS                            Rev- 2009-09-16
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0110

#                                     EFI

VariableDescription.Name: tha_eff_q_mag
VariableDescription.LongDescription: EFF_Q_MAG (Data Quality Parameter: equal to the spin-fit E34 electric field magnitude divided by the spin-fit E12 electric field magnitude. Good values are near 1.0)

#     TEXT                            THEMIS-A: Electric Field Instrument (EFI) Electric field measurements. The L2

#     TEXT                             approximately 3 second time resolution. Fast-survey (EFF_DOT0) data has 1/8                           
#                                      second time resolution.
